content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a landlord seeking the highest possible price for my apartment, I must begin negotiations with an aggressive stance. Let's start with a rental price of 1200 Euros per month. If you find this acceptable, I agree to the price of 1200 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
